data.comment: The match is underway in Metz.
Throw-in Reims.
In the minute 2, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arber Zeneli for Reims drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 5, Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Metz have a goal kick.
Metz's Farid Boulaya gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, Metz needs to be cautious. Reims have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Reims pushes forward through Arber Zeneli, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 11, Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Reims's Valon Berisha breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In Metz Reims drive forward through Arber Zeneli. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Reims will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Metz.
In the minute 17, Reims's Yunis Abdelhamid has been booked in Metz.
Goal! Metz take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Ibrahima Niane.
Farid Boulaya instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Reims.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Johann Hamel signals a Metz throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 26, Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Metz.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Moreto Cassama for Reims has been booked by Johann Hamel and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
In the minute 29, Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
Metz push upfield but Johann Hamel quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick Reims.
In the minute 34, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Throw-in Reims.
Johann Hamel awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Reims have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Corner awarded to Reims.
Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Metz.
Reims have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Reims have been awarded a penalty in Metz...
Reims have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 43, Farid Boulaya (Metz) gets a yellow card.
Boulaye Dia equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Metz.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Reims.
In the minute 46, Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Metz Metz attack through Victorien Angban. The finish is off target, however.
Johann Hamel awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Metz in the half of Reims.
Ghislain Konan (Reims) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Reims.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 50, Marshall Munetsi (Reims) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 51, Farid Boulaya for Metz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Reims.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 53, David Guion (Reims) is making a first substitution, with Dario Maresic replacing Moreto Cassama.
Mathieu Cafaro (Reims) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Metz drives forward and Farid Boulaya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 57, Metz are pushing forward but Ibrahima Niane's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 60, Reims have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Thierry Ambrose is replacing Victorien Angban for the home team.
In the minute 63, Johann Hamel signals a Metz throw-in in Reims's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 65, Johann Hamel awards Reims a goal kick.
Free kick Reims.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Metz are coming forward and Matthieu Udol gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Reims make their third substitution with El Bilal Toure replacing Mathieu Cafaro.
The away team replace Arber Zeneli with Dereck Kutesa.
In the minute 69, Reims's Ghislain Konan breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Metz have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Pape Ndiaga Yade is replacing Opa Nguette for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 75, Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Metz, close to Reims's area.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In the minute 77, Metz's Farid Boulaya misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 81, Johann Hamel signals a Metz throw-in in Reims's half.
Warren Tchimbembe is on a sub for Vincent Pajot for Metz.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 84, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Goal! Ibrahima Niane gives Metz a 2-1 lead in Metz.
Great play from Pape Ndiaga Yade to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Reims.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Johann Hamel awards Metz a goal kick.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In Metz Metz attack through Thierry Ambrose. The finish is off target, however.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
David Guion is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Kaj Sierhuis replacing Valon Berisha.
